new_client_secret_description: Enter the new client secret from Azure Portal. The existing webhooks and imported knowledge will continue to work.
service_account_description: Use a dedicated service account with delegated permissions. Provides granular access control and avoids person-dependency.
tenant_app_description: Use application credentials with Sites.Read.All. Gives access to all sites.
tenant_id_or_domain_description: Your Azure AD tenant ID (UUID) or domain (e.g., contoso.onmicrosoft.com)
please_wait: Please wait while we configure your service account.
failed_to_load_organizations: Failed to load organizations. Please try again.
connection_slow_warning: This is taking longer than expected. Please check your internet connection.
failed_to_start_authentication: Failed to start authentication. Please try again.
enable_templates_description: Allow users to create Assistants and Apps from pre-configured templates
enable_audit_logging_description: Track user actions and system events for compliance and security monitoring
enable_provisioning_description: Automatically create accounts for new users on their first SSO login
delete_template_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
template_in_use_count: This template is currently used by {count} {resource}
rollback_template_confirmation: Restore this template to its original state?
rollback_template_description: This will restore the template to the version that was captured when it was last modified
restore_template_confirmation: Are you sure you want to restore this template? It will be moved back to the active templates list.
failed_to_mark_featured: Failed to mark template as featured
max_featured_templates_reached: Maximum 5 featured templates reached. Remove one to add another.
template_will_be_restored: This template will be restored to the active list
permanent_delete_warning: This will PERMANENTLY delete this template from the database. This action cannot be undone.
permanent_delete_cannot_undo: This action is irreversible and will permanently remove all template data
create_assistant_template_description: Create a new assistant template that can be used across your organization
create_app_template_description: Create a new app template that can be used across your organization
input_type_required: Input type is required for app templates
template_name_already_exists: A template with this name already exists
input_description_placeholder: Describe what input this app expects...
prompt_template_description: The instructions that guide the AI's behavior
ai_behavior_description: Configure how the AI model should respond
wizard_configuration_description: Configure which steps users will see when creating from this template
wizard_attachments_description: Allow users to attach files when creating from this template
wizard_collections_description: Allow users to select knowledge collections when creating from this template
wizard_attachments_required_description: Users must attach at least one file
wizard_collections_required_description: Users must select at least one collection
wizard_attachments_description_placehold: e.g., Upload any relevant guidelines or documents...
wizard_collections_description_placehold: e.g., Choose which knowledge collections to use...
manage_categories_description: Create and manage template categories for better organization
templates_empty_state_description: Create your first template to get started. Templates help standardize assistant and app creation across your organization.
basic_information_description: Provide the fundamental details for your template
category_selector_description: Choose from predefined categories or create your own
custom_category_help: Custom category names should be lowercase with hyphens
template_name_help: A clear, descriptive name that explains the template's purpose
template_description_help: Describe what this template does and when to use it
input_configuration_description: Configure how this app accepts input
input_description_help: Help users understand what input to provide
prompt_help: This prompt will be used as the default for assistants/apps created from this template
delete_category_with_templates_warning: This category contains {count} template(s). Deleting it will affect these templates.
delete_category_consequence: Templates in this category will be moved to 'misc'. This action cannot be undone.
category_help: Select a category to organize this template
provider_type_cannot_be_changed: Provider type cannot be changed after creation
provider_type_change_warning: Changing provider type may require updating credentials and endpoint configuration
provider_name_hint: A unique name to identify this provider instance
endpoint_required_azure: Required. Your Azure OpenAI resource endpoint
endpoint_required_vllm: Required for self-hosted. Common examples: vLLM (http://localhost:8000/v1), Ollama (http://localhost:11434/v1), llama.cpp (http://localhost:8080/v1)
endpoint_optional_openai: Optional. Leave empty for OpenAI (https://api.openai.com/v1) or enter custom endpoint for self-hosted models (vLLM, Ollama, llama.cpp, etc.)
endpoint_optional_default: Optional. Leave empty to use default endpoint for this provider
api_version_required: Required. The Azure OpenAI API version to use
deployment_name_required: Required. Your Azure OpenAI deployment name
provider_status_tooltip_needs_credential: Add your API key to enable this provider
provider_status_tooltip_error: Connection error - check your API key
endpoint_required_for_azure: Endpoint is required for Azure OpenAI
endpoint_required_for_vllm: Endpoint is required for self-hosted OpenAI-compatible providers
api_version_required_for_azure: API Version is required for Azure OpenAI
deployment_name_required_for_azure: Deployment Name is required for Azure OpenAI
endpoint_hint_openai: For self-hosted (vLLM, Ollama, llama.cpp): Required. Common ports: 8000 (vLLM), 11434 (Ollama), 8080 (llama.cpp)
model_identifier_help: The exact model name used by the provider's API. This must match the provider's documentation.
model_identifier_hint: Enter the exact model identifier from your provider (can contain slashes)
model_identifier_hint_embedding: Enter the exact model identifier from your provider
display_name_placeholder_transcription: e.g., Whisper v1, Distil Whisper Large
display_name_hint: User-friendly name shown in the UI
token_limit_help: Maximum number of tokens the model can handle in a conversation (input + output).
vision_help: The model can analyze and understand images in addition to text.
reasoning_help: The model has advanced reasoning capabilities for complex tasks.
dimensions_help: The size of the embedding vector the model produces. Common values are 768, 1024, 1536, or 3072.
model_family_help: E5 models require special input formatting (passage:/query: prefixes). Select E5 for HuggingFace E5 models.
please_select_or_create_provider: Please select or create a provider
delete_model_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
delete_model_warning: If this model is still in use, deletion will be blocked. Migrate or update dependencies first.
migrate_model_description: Move assistants, apps, services, spaces, templates, and questions from {name} to another model.
migrate_model_target_required: Select a target model to continue
migrate_model_confirm_label: Proceed even if compatibility warnings are reported
migrate_model_warning: Assistant parameters will be reset to avoid incompatibilities.
migrate_model_no_targets: No other enabled models available. Create or enable another model first.
failed_to_load_models: Failed to load models. Please try again.
model_identifier_readonly: The model identifier cannot be changed after creation
model_description_placeholder: Describe the model's capabilities and intended use...
embedding_family_hint: The embedding family determines input format and compatibility
model_family_hint: The embedding model family determines input format (e.g., E5 requires "passage:" prefix)
no_models_in_provider: No models configured for this provider.
add_model_to_get_started: Add a model to get started.
no_providers_description: Add your first AI provider to start configuring models for your organization. You can connect to OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and more.
no_providers_helper: Providers manage authentication and access to AI models.
delete_provider_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
delete_provider_blocked: Please remove or migrate all models before deleting this provider.
endpoint_required_vllm: Endpoint URL is required for vLLM
add_models_description: Add one or more models to this provider
provider_no_support_title: This provider ({providerType}) typically does not offer {modelType} models
provider_no_support_description: You can still add a model manually, but make sure the provider supports it to avoid errors.
or_click_finish_directly: or click Finish to add this model
add_at_least_one_model: Add at least one model to finish
audit_logs_description: View and export tenant-wide audit trail for compliance and security monitoring.
audit_logs_will_appear: Audit logs will appear here as users perform actions.
audit_error_loading: Failed to load audit logs. Please try again.
audit_retention_cutoff: Logs older than {date} will be automatically deleted during daily purge at 02:00 UTC.
audit_retention_warning_desc: Logs older than {date} will be deleted during the next purge (tomorrow at 02:00 UTC). Previously deleted logs cannot be recovered.
audit_retention_info_desc: More logs will be preserved going forward. Note: Previously deleted logs cannot be recovered.
audit_category_config_description: Control which categories of events are logged for compliance monitoring
audit_disable_warning: You are about to disable logging for {category}. The following actions will no longer be logged:
audit_compliance_warning: Disabling critical audit categories may affect compliance requirements and forensic capabilities. Consider the implications carefully.
audit_config_description: Manage which actions are logged. Changes take effect immediately for new events.
audit_logging_description: Configure audit logging for compliance and security
audit_logging_config_description: Configure which actions should be logged
audit_access_required_description: Before viewing audit logs, please provide justification for this access. This information will be logged for compliance purposes.
audit_access_description_placeholder: Explain why you need to access audit logs and what you're looking for...
audit_access_description_required: Please provide a detailed explanation (minimum 10 characters)
conversation_retention_description: Automatically delete conversation history older than specified days
conversation_retention_inherit_space: Space setting is set to {days} days
conversation_retention_overrides_space: This assistant overrides the space default ({days} days).
conversation_retention_warning_enable: This will permanently delete conversations older than {days} days. This action cannot be undone.
conversation_retention_warning_reduce: Reducing the retention period from {oldDays} to {newDays} days will delete older conversations during the next cleanup. This action cannot be undone.
conversation_retention_tenant_descriptio: Default retention policy for all spaces, assistants, and apps without specific policies
conversation_retention_space_description: Applies to all assistants and apps in this space that don't have their own retention policy
conversation_retention_assistant_descrip: Overrides space and organization policies for this assistant
conversation_retention_app_description: Overrides space and organization policies for this app
conversation_retention_warning_confirm: I understand this will permanently delete conversations
user_groups_description: Groups of users that have access to this space. All members of a group inherit the group's role.
no_group_members_in_space: No user groups have been added to this space
could_not_add_group: Could not add group to space.
select_role_for_group: Select a role for this group
confirm_remove_group: Do you really want to remove the group '{groupName}' from this space? All group members will lose access through this group membership.
could_not_add_user_to_group: Could not add user to group.
could_not_remove_user_from_group: Could not remove user from group.
compare_new_activity_tooltip: New activity with no prior data
compare_increase_tooltip: Increase of {percent}% compared to previous period
compare_decrease_tooltip: Decrease of {percent}% compared to previous period
no_activity_description: No conversations were recorded during the selected time period. Try selecting a different date range.
voice_input_unsupported_browser: Voice input is not supported in this browser
